name: Maze (itch) (Enmar)
description:
A short maze that I made in my free time. Beat the game by reaching the last gold block on the gold maze. This game takes around 10 minutes to beat if you now what you are doing. This is my first Java game, enjoy!

Controls 

  • To walk press ↑
  • To walk backwards press ↓
  • To look to the right press →
  • To look to the left press ←
